metadata.synopsis: The warchief hassles two other goblins, demanding why raiding the nearby storehouse is taking so long.

1.speaker: Rozzak
1.text: What's taking you two so long? Get the goods and get moving!
1.context: NodeContext: Preemptively annoyed with his subordinates - they're not very smart.

3.speaker: Warrior Clack
3.text: Gurd keeps sneezing and dropping stuff.
3.context: NodeContext: Respectfully talking to his boss - and getting his friend in trouble

2.speaker: Brawler Gurd
2.text: Shut your mouth! I... *Ah-choo!* Feckin' leaves.
2.context: NodeContext: Gurd is allergic to the herbs in the storehouse he looted and keeps sneezing

0.speaker: Rozzak
0.text: You serious? Stuff something in yer nose and hurry up.
